Package ojc.bain.neuron

Contains classes that implement neuron models.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FixedFrequencyNeuronCollection
    A collection of neurons that produce spikes at a fixed frequency.
    FixedFrequencyNeuronConfiguration
    Configuration for FixedFrequencyNeuronCollection.
    FixedProtocolNeuronCollection
    A that produces pre-determined spike patterns.
    FixedProtocolNeuronConfiguration
    A that produces pre-determined spike patterns.
    LinearNeuronCollection
    Implements neurons that simply pass through received input.
    NeuronRandom
    A that produces randomised spike trains.
    NeuronRandomConfig
    Configuration for NeuronRandom.

Package ojc.bain.neuron Description

Contains classes that implement neuron models. All neuron models extend from NeuronCollection
